articles.description: As the World Wide Web turns 35, its inventor Tim Berners-Lee has some bold ideas about what it will look like 35 years into the future.
articles.content:
Tim Berners-Lee is credited with inventing the World Wide Web in 1989. But he has been dissatisfied with the way his original vision for the web has panned out.

articles.title: Cicadas' unique urination unlocks new understanding of fluid dynamics - Phys.org
